医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示社会经济发展对全球癌症负担的影响癌症仍然是一个重大的公共卫生挑战，GLOBOCAN 2020 报告估计全球将有 1930 万新癌症病例和 1000 万癌症相关死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Study-shows-the-impact-of-socioeconomic-development-on-global-cancer-burden.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Study-shows-the-impact-of-socioeconomic-development-on-global-cancer-burden.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42223f98-bde9-4a5c-88b3-859366f79be6 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 22:07:17 -0500 Study shows the impact of socioeconomic development on global cancer burden
斯坦福大学研究人员开发人工智能模型来增强癌症预后预测视觉信息（例如显微镜和 X 射线图像、CT 和 MRI 扫描）与文本（考试笔记、不同专业医生之间的沟通）的融合是癌症护理的关键组成部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Stanford-researchers-develop-AI-model-to-enhance-cancer-prognosis-predictions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Stanford-researchers-develop-AI-model-to-enhance-cancer-prognosis-predictions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69ad9ebe-df61-4a73-8dc1-2d84f3fe29c8 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 22:02:57 -0500 Stanford researchers develop AI model to enhance cancer prognosis predictions
新的脑干细胞发现可能会带来更好的胶质母细胞瘤治疗方法大脑中新型干细胞的发现可能会为最致命的脑肿瘤带来更好的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/New-brain-stem-cell-discovery-could-usher-in-better-treatments-for-glioblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/New-brain-stem-cell-discovery-could-usher-in-better-treatments-for-glioblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4972d99e-6de8-45b2-a3ec-b696fe721729 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 21:57:16 -0500 New brain stem cell discovery could usher in better treatments for glioblastoma
新的纳米平台结合了焦亡和铁死亡以增强癌症治疗光免疫疗法是一种创新的癌症治疗方法，将光疗与免疫疗法相结合，选择性地靶向并破坏癌细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/New-nanoplatform-combines-pyroptosis-and-ferroptosis-for-enhanced-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/New-nanoplatform-combines-pyroptosis-and-ferroptosis-for-enhanced-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1017821-b1ab-4ef7-8432-5d8f787c3222 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 21:51:36 -0500 New nanoplatform combines pyroptosis and ferroptosis for enhanced cancer treatment
加州大学圣地亚哥分校与疾病预防控制中心 (CDC) 一起开展开创性的大流行防备计划美国疾病控制与预防中心 (CDC) 选择加州大学圣地亚哥分校作为三个合作机构之一，以建立突破性的大流行防范计划，即社区和家庭急性呼吸系统疾病监测 (CHARM) 网络。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/UC-San-Diego-joins-CDC-in-groundwriting-pandemic-preparedness-initiative.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/UC-San-Diego-joins-CDC-in-groundwriting-pandemic-preparedness-initiative.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fddf135b-20c1-4ae7-82fe-bbb856f6d261 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 21:46:12 -0500 UC San Diego joins CDC in groundbreaking pandemic preparedness initiative
新的人工智能方法预测人类细胞中的基因活性使用新的人工智能方法，哥伦比亚大学瓦格洛斯内科和外科医生学院的研究人员可以准确预测任何人体细胞内基因的活动，从本质上揭示细胞的内部机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/New-AI-method-predicts-gene-activity-in- human-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/New-AI-method-predicts-gene-activity-in- human-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0c19a4c-6be9-47f9-8ef9-6cf26fa3efe5 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 21:43:59 -0500 New AI method predicts gene activity in human cells
高频脊柱刺激有望减少肌肉痉挛最近的研究表明，脊髓电刺激是脊髓损伤后重建行走的一种有前景的策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/High-Frequency-spinal-stimulation-shows-promise-in-reducing-muscle-spasticity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/High-Frequency-spinal-stimulation-shows-promise-in-reducing-muscle-spasticity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d70e6706-a0fa-4926-832e-4e14069cd416 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 21:26:05 -0500 High-frequency spinal stimulation shows promise in reducing muscle spasticity
研究揭示了 Neuropilin2 基因如何影响自闭症和癫痫的发展Neuropilin2 基因编码一种参与大脑细胞间相互作用的受体，在调节神经回路的发育中发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Study-reveals-how-neuropilin2-gene-influences-autism-and-epilepsy-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Study-reveals-how-neuropilin2-gene-influences-autism-and-epilepsy-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=192d2577-3ae4-4fff-9b6b-d7264c6646b2 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 21:17:06 -0500 Study reveals how neuropilin2 gene influences autism and epilepsy development
睡眠不足会抑制大脑抑制不想要的记忆的能力一项新的研究表明，睡眠不足会抑制大脑抑制不想要的记忆和侵入性想法的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Sleep-deprivation-inhibits-the-brains-ability-to-suppress-unwanted-memories.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Sleep-deprivation-inhibits-the-brains-ability-to-suppress-unwanted-memories.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1eda0023-3f2b-4541-826c-6cdeded71954 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 21:12:13 -0500 Sleep deprivation inhibits the brain's ability to suppress unwanted memories
研究人员发现了导致亨廷顿舞蹈病 RNA 加工缺陷的分子机制加州大学欧文分校领导的研究小组发现了驱动 RNA 加工缺陷的复杂分子机制，这些缺陷导致亨廷顿舞蹈症，并将 HD 与其他神经退行性疾病（如肌萎缩侧索硬化症、额颞叶痴呆和阿尔茨海默病）联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Researchers-uncover-molecular-mechanisms-driven-RNA-processing-defects-in-Huntingtons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Researchers-uncover-molecular-mechanisms-driven-RNA-processing-defects-in-Huntingtons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5ee86fe-5c32-4a17-8158-96ba6af5ab51 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 21:08:09 -0500 Researchers uncover molecular mechanisms driving RNA processing defects in Huntington's disease
